product_name: Sherpani Solstice Ultralight Carry-On Luggage - Women's
long_description: True to the Sherpani passion for innovation, the Solstice Ultralight Carry-On Luggage is the quite possibly the lightest 22-inch carry-on available, yet it's loaded with great travel features.
short_description: True to the Sherpani passion for innovation, the Solstice Ultralight Carry-On Luggage is the quite possibly the lightest 22-inch carry-on available, yet it's loaded with great travel features.
